summary: Patient reports shortness of breath and chest tightness for 3 days, exacerbated by activity; has type 2 diabetes and hypertension.
chief_complaint: Shortness of breath and chest tightness
rx_dose: 0.4 mg sublingual tablets, to take as needed
follow_up: return in 2 weeks if chest pain occurs at rest, lasts more than 15 minutes, or is accompanied by sweating or severe breathlessness
red_flags: chest pain lasts more than 15 minutes
chest pain is accompanied by sweating or severe breathlessness
